name: What's So Cool About Henshin Heroes
name_original: What's So Cool About Henshin Heroes
description: You are a HENSHIN HERO, a hot blooded transforming ally of justice. With the help of a piece of  fantastic and mysterious technology called a HENSHIN MORPHER you can change from a mild mannered civilian into a super powered form that allows you to defend the innocent and defeat the forces of evil. You team up with other heroes, pilot giant robots, grow to fantastic size, or do all of the above in order to battle hordes of nefarious themed monsters and shadowy villainous organizations.
